# Interactive component

Link to the interactive plot
- https://vizhub.com/andycho97/2f2bc6c6289a4b47bae1bd37513b2e01?edit=files&file=index.js&line&mode=hide (based on the positive cases)

- (based on the positive cases per 100,000 people)

- https://vizhub.com/andycho97/6afca188b399426cab2e6375717f44e1?edit=files&file=index.js&line (based on the COVID-19 test positivity rate)

Instructions for the interactive plot:

- Hover on each state and it will show the state's 7 day average of deaths, positive COVID-19 cases, total number of tests, and the positivity rate in percent
- The colours of the states represent the relative number of positive cases in log scale
